judges: Before Schaffer, Maxey, Drew, Linn, Stern and Barnes, JJ.

opinions.text:
Per Curiam,
The judgment is affirmed on the opinion of Judge Gordon.
opinions.author: Per Curiam,

attorneys: Edwin S. Meins, with him John V. Espenshade and I. Smith Raspin, for appellant.
Bryan A. Mermes and Nathan Griffith, for appellee, were not heard.
casebody.head_matter:
Espenshade, Appellant, v. McCorkle.
Argued December 4,1936.
Before Schaffer, Maxey, Drew, Linn, Stern and Barnes, JJ.
Edwin S. Meins, with him John V. Espenshade and I. Smith Raspin, for appellant.
Bryan A. Mermes and Nathan Griffith, for appellee, were not heard.
January 11, 1937:
